data.title: Trailer Hitch Install: CURT 14081 on 1994 Chevrolet K3500
data.description:
http://www.curtmfg.com
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 14081 class IV trailer hitch on a 1994 Chevrolet K3500 Pickup.

Install Sheet - https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/14081/installsheet/CM_14081_INS.PDF


Application Coverage:
1988 - 2000 CHEVY/GMC ALL FULL SIZE W/DUAL EXHAUST (OLD STYLE)
1988 - 1998 CHEVY/GMC 1500 TON W/6' & 8' BED (OLD STYLE)
1988 - 2000 CHEVY/GMC 3/4 & 1 TON CLASSIC, 6' & 8' BED (OLD STYLE)
1992 - 1998 CHEVY/GMC 4 DR CREW CAB ONLY

*See   http://curtmfg.com/part/14081#tab=vehicles   for exceptions for pickups with/without dual exhaust.

Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.
*** USE EXISTING VEHICLE HARDWARE ***

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.
-Need help or have some questions? Call Technical Support at 800.798.0813 (Monday-Friday 8am-7pm CST)

data.title: Trailer Hitch Install: CURT 13359 on 1997 Ford F150
data.tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, trailer hitch, curt 13359, towing, how to install, Ford F-150, F150
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 13359 class III trailer hitch on a 1997 Ford F-150.

Install Sheet - https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/13359/installsheet/CM_13359_INS.PDF

No Drilling Required

Application Coverage:
1997 - 2003 Ford F-150
1997 - 1999 Ford F-250LD
1999 - 2015 Ford F-250, F-350 Super Duty with 20" spare or smaller
2008 - 2015 Ford F-450 Except Cab and Chassis



Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.
*** USE EXISTING VEHICLE HARDWARE ***

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.

data.description:
http://www.curtmfg.com

This video depicts the installation of the CURT 56070 5th Wheel/Gooseneck OEM wiring Extension on a 2013 Chevrolet Silverado 3500 HD.

Install Sheet:
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/56070/installsheet/CME_56070_INS.PDF

All Steps must be followed to ensure correct function of the T-Connector.  To verify proper installation once installed, test by connecting a test light or properly wired trailer.

data.title: Trailer Hitch Installation: CURT 13020 GMC Jimmy
data.tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, trailer hitch, towing, how to install, curt 13020, GMC Jimmy, Envoy, Chevy Trailblazer, Oldsmobile Bravada
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 13020 Class 3 Trailer hitch on a 1996 GMC Jimmy. 

Install Sheet - https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/13020/installsheet/CM_13020_INS.PDF

PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.
